ts.description: Unix timestamp given in milliseconds when the data was sampled

seq.description: Sequence number of the message. This is a counter, used for ordering message if `ts` not available/used

type.description: Enmeration for the kind of alert. This value can be user defined. TBD: the range for custom values

val.description: This represents the value that triggered the alert. For instance, if a threshold was crossed and this is the violating value
